turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to order a coffee for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one from the Starbucks on West Temple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking at the black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a black a venti black and white mocha with whole milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti black and white mocha, whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up at the location on 3300 South in Salt Lake City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks 3300 south.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you very much. Bye.
